sentences.en: a new drug that is undergoing clinical trials
sentences.cn: 正在接受临床试验的一种新药

sentences.en: He is currently on trial accused of serious drugs charges.
sentences.cn: 他目前正因严重的毒品控罪而受审。

sentences.en: He is expected to be committed for trial at Liverpool Crown Court.
sentences.cn: 预计他会被移交利物浦高等刑事法庭。

sentences.en: He presided at the trial of the Maguire Seven.
sentences.cn: 他主审马圭尔等七人案。

sentences.en: He sat through the trial as a standby juror.
sentences.cn: 他作为候补陪审员参加了审判的全过程。

sentences.en: He spent the next hour going over the trial in his mind.
sentences.cn: 接下来的一小时里，他在脑子里反复考虑了这次审判。

sentences.en: He's awaiting trial, which is expected to begin early next year.
sentences.cn: 他在等候审判，预计明年初开始。

sentences.en: His trial revived memories of French suffering during the war.
sentences.cn: 他的受审重新勾起了在战争中受苦受难的法国人民的回忆。

sentences.en: I gather his report is highly critical of the trial judge.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，他在报道中毫不留情地批评了初审法官。

sentences.en: I took the car out for a trial on the roads.
sentences.cn: 我开车上路试驾了一下。

sentences.en: Larry Layton's trial is going full tilt right now.
sentences.cn: 拉里·莱顿一案的审判工作即将全面展开。

sentences.en: New evidence showed the police lied at the trial.
sentences.cn: 新的证据表明警方在审讯时撒了谎.

sentences.en: She was sent for trial yesterday accused of pushing drugs.
sentences.cn: 她因被控贩毒昨天被送交法院接受审判。

sentences.en: The Kravchenko trial became a cause celebre in Paris and internationally.
sentences.cn: 克拉夫琴克一案在巴黎甚至全世界曾经轰动一时。

sentences.en: The robots have been on trial for the past year.
sentences.cn: 这些机器人过去一年都在试用当中。

sentences.en: The trial is due to start next week.
The trial resulted in acquittals on all but one count.
sentences.cn: 审判结果是除一项罪名之外其他罪名都不成立。

sentences.en: They succeeded in the experiment on the fifteenth trial.
sentences.cn: 他们在第十五次试验时获得了成功。

sentences.en: We plan to release a prototype this autumn for trial in hospitals.
sentences.cn: 我们计划今年秋天在各医院推出一个模型进行试验。 。
